description: Situated amid the foothills around Garda, this restaurant boasts fine views from its verdant terrace which take in much of the southern part of the lake, while its dining rooms occupy the interior of an old olive mill. The menu features freshwater fish such as pike and whitefish as well as seafood and meat dishes.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Great view', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
